thread.title: Harley CEO looks to strategy, not merger

title: Harley CEO looks to strategy, not merger
text:
Harley CEO looks to strategy, not merger 9:51am EST - 01:07 
Harley-Davidson CEO Matt Levatich is asking investors to be patient with his strategy to turn around the slump in demand for its iconic motorcycles, amid speculation of a merger or private equity buyout. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Harley-Davidson CEO Matt Levatich is asking investors to be patient with his strategy to turn around the slump in demand for its iconic motorcycles, amid speculation of a merger or private equity buyout.
